questions.question: Bart is new to social networking and wants to be safe. What should he never post?

choices.answer: a list of his top ten favorite movies

questions.question: What tips should you follow while gaming online?

choices.answer: You don't need tips becuse online gaming is safe
Don't use online games because nothing is safe online
Fight back against bullying and be rude too
not responding to bullying, blocking harassers

questions.question: What is the risk for adding a credit card to a new game you have downloaded?

choices.answer: Card will be given to other game publishers
your device will be infected with malware
your card will be charged for excessive minutes
your card may be charged for things you did not want to buy

questions.question: Heather found a phone at school with naked pictures on it. What should she do?

choices.answer: print the pictures and post them at school
forward the pictures to her friends
give phone to person in authority

questions.question: Why do people who are bullied often end up being a bully to others?

choices.answer: so others will realize how it feels
bullying others gives them a false sense of control and power
if people are mean, they deserve bullying
The more they bully, the more difficult to get caught
